DataCommand.Name: Dashboard.FetchGivingData
DataCommand.CommandText: SELECT Giving.[Church_Id] as ChurchId, widgetItem.[UserWidgetItemID] as WidgetItemId, Giving.[SummaryNumber], Giving.[CountNumber], Giving.[Date] FROM [ChmContribution].[dbo].[View_Contribution_GetGivingData] as Giving (NOEXPAND) LEFT JOIN [ChmDashboard].[dbo].[UserWidgetItem] as widgetItem WITH(NOLOCK) ON widgetItem.WidgetItemReferId = Giving.[Fund_Id] AND widgetItem.SourceTypeID = 1 WHERE Giving.[Church_Id] = @ChurchId AND Giving.[Date] > @StartDate AND Giving.[Date] < @EndDate #WhereStr# ORDER BY Giving.[Date] ASC

DataCommand.Name: Dashboard.FetchAttendanceData
DataCommand.CommandText:
;WITH tData AS( SELECT 0 as WidgetReferId, WidgetItemReferId, SUM(SummaryNumber) as SummaryNumber, 0 AS CountNumber,[Date] FROM ( SELECT 0 as WidgetReferId, am.MINISTRY_ID as WidgetItemReferId, SUM(adi.attendance) AS SummaryNumber, 0 AS CountNumber, CAST(ai.START_CHECKIN as date) AS [Date] FROM ChmActivity.DBO.ACTIVITY_DETAIL_INSTANCE AS adi WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN ChmActivity.DBO.ACTIVITY_INSTANCE AS ai WITH(NOLOCK) ON adi.ACTIVITY_INSTANCE_ID = ai.ACTIVITY_INSTANCE_ID INNER JOIN ChmActivity.DBO.ACTIVITY_MINISTRY AS am WITH(NOLOCK) ON ai.ACTIVITY_ID=am.ACTIVITY_ID LEFT JOIN [ChmDashboard].[dbo].[UserWidgetItem] AS widgetItem WITH(NOLOCK) ON widgetItem.WidgetItemReferId = am.MINISTRY_ID AND widgetItem.SourceTypeID = 2 WHERE adi.church_id =@ChurchId AND ai.START_CHECKIN >= @StartDate AND ai.START_CHECKIN <= @EndDate #WhereStr_mn# GROUP BY am.MINISTRY_ID,CAST(ai.START_CHECKIN as date) UNION ALL SELECT 0 as WidgetReferId, MINISTRY_ID AS WidgetItemReferId, SummaryNumber AS SummaryNumber, 0 AS CountNumber, [Date] FROM ChmActivity.[dbo].[View_Activity_GetMinistryData] AS am WITH(NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN [ChmDashboard].[dbo].[UserWidgetItem] AS widgetItem WITH(NOLOCK) ON widgetItem.WidgetItemReferId = am.MINISTRY_ID AND widgetItem.SourceTypeID = 2 WHERE am.CHURCH_ID = @ChurchId AND am.Date >= @StartDate AND am.Date <= @EndDate #WhereStr_mn# ) t GROUP BY WidgetItemReferId,[Date]
UNION --
SELECT 0 as WidgetReferId, Group_Type_ID AS WidgetItemReferId, SUM(PresentCount) AS SummaryNumber, COUNT(1) AS CountNumber, StartDate AS [Date] FROM ( SELECT g.Group_Type_ID,ats.PresentCount,CAST(ats.StartDateTime AS DATE) AS StartDate FROM ChmPeople.DBO.AttendanceSummary ats JOIN ChmPeople.DBO.Groups g on ats.AttendanceContextValueID = g.Group_ID LEFT JOIN [ChmDashboard].[dbo].[UserWidgetItem] as widgetItem WITH(NOLOCK) ON widgetItem.WidgetItemReferId = g.Group_Type_ID AND widgetItem.SourceTypeID = 3 WHERE ats.ChurchID = @ChurchId AND ats.PresentCount > 0 AND ats.StartDateTime >=@StartDate AND ats.StartDateTime <=@EndDate #WhereStr_gt# ) t GROUP BY Group_Type_ID,StartDate ) SELECT * FROM tData ORDER BY Date ASC

DataCommand.Name: Dashboard.FetchAttributeData
DataCommand.CommandText: ;WITH tData as ( SELECT attr.ATTRIBUTE_ID, ia.INDIVIDUAL_ID, CAST(ia.START_DATE as date) AS [Date] FROM ChmPeople.DBO.ATTRIBUTE_GROUP ag(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN ChmPeople.DBO.ATTRIBUTE attr(NOLOCK) ON ag.ATTRIBUTE_GROUP_ID = attr.ATTRIBUTE_GROUP_ID INNER JOIN ChmPeople.DBO.INDIVIDUAL_ATTRIBUTE ia(NOLOCK) ON ia.ATTRIBUTE_ID = attr.ATTRIBUTE_ID AND ia.CHURCH_ID = @ChurchId LEFT JOIN [ChmDashboard].[dbo].[UserWidgetItem] as widgetItem WITH(NOLOCK) ON widgetItem.WidgetItemReferId = attr.ATTRIBUTE_ID AND widgetItem.SourceTypeID = 4 WHERE ag.ENABLED =1 AND attr.ENABLED=1 AND attr.HAS_START_DATE = 1 AND ia.START_DATE is not null AND ia.START_DATE >= @StartDate AND ia.START_DATE <= @EndDate #WhereStr# ) SELECT 0 as WidgetReferId, ATTRIBUTE_ID as WidgetItemReferId, COUNT(INDIVIDUAL_ID) AS SummaryNumber, COUNT(1) AS CountNumber, [Date] FROM tData GROUP BY ATTRIBUTE_ID, [Date]
